Posts.Content: Nov 20, 2017 09:19AM bbbel wrote: Hi. I have a lump under my left armpit. it is firm, not soft. about 2-3 cm. I do not have any family history of breast cancer. Doctor suspect TB instead. She said that my lump is a rare case, and the lump is not a lymph node. However, there are 1-2 swollen lymph nodes there. I had needle biopsy on both the lymph node and lump. Results came back, they did not find any cancer cells. Doctor asked if i want to get the whole lump removed and biopsy on other areas just in case but parents do not want to have surgery. Currently i am waiting for TB results which wont be out so soon. I also don't have any symptoms related to TB. A month later, my armpit is achy and uncomfortable.. if i keep pressing on that area, it will become sore. i am not convinced about the results. i am only 19 this year i am very scared. i do not have any other symptoms.. Right now, the lump has been there for 2-3 months. Does anyone have a similar case to mine? i am very scared right now. it feels like the lump is growing. Also, it would be nice if any of you can teach me how to create my own forum? thanks!
Posts.Title: Worried overr marble sized mass on left breast near the armpit. FemaleAthlete FemaleAthlete

Posts.Content: Nov 21, 2017 07:19AM bbbel wrote: Hi. I have a lump under my left armpit. it is firm, not soft. it used to be about 1.5cm. I do not have any family history of breast cancer. Doctor suspect TB instead. She said that my lump is a rare case, and the lump is not a lymph node. However, there are 1-2 swollen lymph nodes there. I had needle biopsy on both the lymph node and lump. Results came back, they did not find any cancer cells. Doctor asked if i want to get the whole lump removed and biopsy on other areas just in case but parents do not want to have surgery. Currently i am waiting for TB results which wont be out so soon. I also don't have any symptoms related to TB. A month later, my armpit is achy and uncomfortable.. i feel like it has grown thicker and the size went to 2-3cm. if i keep pressing on that area, it will become sore. i am not convinced about the results. i am only 19 this year i am very scared. i do not have any other symptoms.. Right now, the lump has been there for 2-3 months. Does anyone have a similar case to mine? i am very scared right now. it feels like the lump is growing.
Posts.Title: 18 year old with fast growing mass Lanus bbbel
